fathomer.name: Fathomer

action.title: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.

action.title: Dagger (Human Form Only)
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

fathomer.spells: chill touch, eldritch blast, mage hand, armor of agathys, expeditious retreat, hex, invisibility, vampiric touch

trait.title: Shapechanger (2/day)
value: The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked unconscious or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to poison damage, as well as resistance to fire damage and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons. It also has immunity to the following conditions: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

trait.title: Olhydra's Armor (Human Form Only)
value: The fathomer can cast mage armor at will, without expending material components.

trait.title: Spellcasting (Human Form Only)
value: The fathomer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has two 3rd-level spell slots, which it regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:
• Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, mage hand
• 1st level: armor of Agathys, expeditious retreat, hex
• 2nd level: invisibility
• 3rd level: Vampiric touch

feathergale_knight.name: Feathergale Knight

action.title: Multiattack
value: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

feathergale_knight.spells: gust (ee), light, message, ray of frost, expeditious retreat, feather fall

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The knight is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spell:
• Cantrips (at will): gust, light, message, ray of frost
• 1st level (2 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) acid damage on a faile dsave, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Sticky Leg (Recharges when the Steeder Has No Creatures Grappled
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The target is stuck ot the steeder's leg and grappled until it escapes (escape DC 12)

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Leap
value: The steeder can expend all its movement on iuts turn to jump up to 90 feet vertically or horizontally, provided that is speed is at least 30 feet.

fire_elemental.name: Fire Elemental

action.title: Multiattack
value: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.title: Touch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

fire_elemental.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Fire Form
value: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.title: Illumination
value: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 ft..

trait.title: Water Susceptibility
value: For every 5 ft. the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

fire_elemental.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

fire_elemental_myrmidon.name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon

action.title: Multiattack
value: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

action.title: Scimitar
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Fiery Strikes (Recharge 6)
value: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) fire damage.

fire_elemental_myrmidon.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Illumination
value: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Water Susceptibility
value: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

fire_elemental_myrmidon.languages: Ignan, one language of its creator's choice

action.title: Multiattack
value: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage.

action.title: Rock
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

fire_snake.name: Fire Snake

action.title: Multiattack
value: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

fire_snake.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Heated Body
value: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

flameskull.name: Flameskull
flameskull.speed: 0 ft., fly 40 ft. It can hover.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.

action.title: Fire Ray
value: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.

flameskull.spells: mage hand, magic missile, shield, blur, flaming sphere, fireball

trait.title: Illumination
value: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15- foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 ft.. It can switch between the options as an action.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Rejuvenation
value: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a dispel magic or remove curse spell is cast on them.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand
• 1st level (3 slots): magic missile, shield
• 2nd level (2 slots): blur, flaming sphere
• 3rd level (1 slot): fireball

flamewrath.name: Flamewrath

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

flamewrath.spells: control flames (ee), fire bolt, friends, light, minor illusion, burning hands, color spray, mage armor, scorching ray, suggestion, fireball, hypnotic pattern, fire shield

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The flamewrath is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:
• Cantrips (at will): control flames, fire bolt, friends, light, minor illusion
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, color spray, mage armor
• 2nd level (3 slots): scorching ray, suggestion
• 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, hypnotic pattern
• 4th level (1 slot): fire shield (see Wreathed in Flame)

trait.title: Wreathed in Flame
value: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the fire shield spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

flesh_golem.name: Flesh Golem
flesh_golem.immune: lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

action.title: Multiattack
value: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Berserk
value: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

The golem's creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk golem, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

trait.title: Aversion of Fire
value: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

trait.title: Immutable Form
value: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.title: Lightning Absorption
value: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

flesh_golem.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
flesh_golem.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

flumph.name: Flumph

action.title: Tendrils
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 2 (1d4) acid damage on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success. A lesser restoration spell cast on the target also ends the recurring acid damage.

action.title: Stench Spray (1/Day)
value: Each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the flumph must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be coated in a foul-smelling liquid. A coated creature exudes a horrible stench for 1d4 hours. The coated creature is poisoned as long as the stench lasts, and other creatures are poisoned while with in 5 feet of the coated creature. A creature can remove the stench on itself by using a short rest to bathe in water, alcohol, or vinegar.

trait.title: Advanced Telepathy
value: The flumph can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 feet of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telepathy.

trait.title: Prone Deficiency
value: If the flumph is knocked prone, roll a die. On an odd result, the flumph lands upside-down and is incapacitated. At the end of each of its turns, the flumph can make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, righting itself and ending the incapacitated condition if it succeeds.

trait.title: Telepathic Shroud
value: The flumph is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

flumph.languages: understands Undercommon but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.

trait.title: Flyby
value: The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

flying_sword.name: Flying Sword
flying_sword.speed: 0 ft., fly 50 ft. It can hover.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.title: Antimagic Susceptibility
value: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

flying_sword.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

action.title: Multiattack
value: The fomorian attacks twice with its greatclub or makes one greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once.

action.title: Greatclub
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Evil Eye
value: The fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within 60 feet of it to make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. The creature takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Curse of the Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: With a stare, the fomorian uses Evil Eye, but on a failed save, the creature is also cursed with magical deformities. While deformed, the creature has its speed halved and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.
The transformed creature can repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

fraz-urb'luu.name: Fraz-Urb'luu
fraz-urb'luu.immune: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

action.title: Multiattack
value: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

fraz-urb'luu.spells: alter self, detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force, confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming, mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium-sized when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force
3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming
1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magic effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapon
value: Fraz-Urb'luu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Undetectable
value: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

Fraz-Urb'luu can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creautre's turn. Fraz-Urb'luu regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary.title: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The frog can breathe air and water

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: The frog's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.title: Greataxe
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

action.title: Rock
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

frulam_mondath.name: Frulam Mondath

action.title: Multiattack
value: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

action.title: Halberd
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

frulam_mondath.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary, calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon, mass healing word, spirit guardians

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians

galeb_duhr.name: Galeb Duhr
galeb_duhr.speed: 15 ft. (30 ft. when rolling, 60 ft. rolling downhill)

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Animate Boulders (1/Day)
value: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 ft. of it. A boulder has statistics like those of a galeb duhr, except it has Intelligence 1 and Charisma 1, it can't be charmed or frightened, and it lacks this action option. A boulder remains animated as long as the galeb duhr maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell) .

galeb_duhr.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the galeb duhr remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal boulder.

trait.title: Rolling Charge
value: If the galeb duhr rolls at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

gar_shatterkeel.name: Gar Shatterkeel

action.title: Multiattack
value: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

action.title: Drown
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

gar_shatterkeel.spells: mending, resistance, shape water (ee), create or destroy water, cure wounds, fog cloud, thunderwave, darkvision, hold person, protection from poison, call lightning, sleet storm, tidal wave (ee), control water, ice storm, scrying

trait.title: Amphibious
value: Gar can breathe air and water.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
value: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mending, resistance, shape water
• 1st level (4 slots): create or destroy water, cure wounds, fog cloud, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): darkvision, hold person, protection from poison
• 3rd level (3 slots): call lightning, sleet storm, tidal wave
• 4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm
• 5th level (1 slot): scrying

trait.title: Water Walk
value: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

trait.title: Watery Fall
value: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

gargoyle.name: Gargoyle

action.title: Multiattack
value: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

gargoyle.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the gargoyle remains motion less, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

gas_spore.name: Gas Spore

action.title: Touch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

trait.title: Death Burst
value: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to 1d12+the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes poisoned for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts 2d4 Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

trait.title: Eerie Resemblance
value: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

gas_spore.conditionImmune: blinded, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone

gelatinous_cube.name: Gelatinous Cube

action.title: Pseudopod
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

action.title: Engulf
value: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

trait.title: Ooze Cube
value: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage.
The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

trait.title: Transparent
value: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

gelatinous_cube.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

action.title: Multiattack
value: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Garrote
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.title: Assassinate
value: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.title: Limited Amphibiousness
value: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.title: Shark Telepathy
value: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

trait.title: Sneak Attack
value: Ghald deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't incapacitated and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.title: Stench
value: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the ghast must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.title: Turn Defiance
value: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 ft. of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.speed: 0 ft., fly 40 ft. It can hover.

action.title: Withering Touch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

action.title: Etherealness
value: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.title: Horrifying Visage
value: Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 _ 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.title: Possession (Recharge 6)
value: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

ghost.resist: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Ethereal Sight
value: The ghost can see 60 ft. into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.title: Incorporeal Movement
value: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

ghost.languages: any languages it knew in life
ghost.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Multiattack

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Rock
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (7d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Echolocation
value: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.title: Keen Hearing
value: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.title: Tusk
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.title: Charge
value: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.title: Bite
value: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Hold Breath
value: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

giant_eagle.name: Giant Eagle

action.title: Multiattack
value: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Talons

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 — 1) slashing damage.

trait.title: Illumination
value: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft..

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.title: Swallow
value: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The frog can breathe air and water

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

action.title: Ram
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Charge
value: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Sure-Footed
value: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.title: Rampage
value: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Variant: Hold Breath
value: The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

trait.title: Variant: Spider Climb
value: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.title: Tentacles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.title: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.title: Hold Breath
value: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.title: Underwater Camouflage
value: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

giant_owl.name: Giant Owl

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.title: Flyby
value: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Sight
value: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

giant_owl.languages: Giant Owl, understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.title: Sting
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Ram
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Charge
value: If the sea horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

action.title: Bite
value: Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.title: Blood Frenzy
value: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.title: Web (Recharge 5-6)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Web Sense
value: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.title: Web Walker
value: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.title: Swallow
value: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The toad can breathe air and water

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: The toad's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Sight and Smell
value: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Sting
value: Sting. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.title: Bite
value: Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.title: Bite
value: Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Web Sense
value: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.title: Web Walker
value: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.title: Bites
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (5d6) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.title: Blinding Spittle (Recharge 5-6)
value: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.

trait.title: Aberrant Ground
value: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.title: Gibbering
value: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

githyanki_knight.name: Githyanki Knight

action.title: Multiattack
value: The githyanki makes two silver greatsword attacks.

action.title: Silver Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

githyanki_knight.spells: mage hand, jump, misty step, nondetection, tongues, plane shift, telekinesis

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only), tongues
1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

githyanki_warrior.name: Githyanki Warrior

action.title: Multiattack
value: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

githyanki_warrior.spells: mage hand, jump, misty step, nondetection

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)

action.title: Unarmed Strike
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

trait.title: Psychic Defense
value: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

value: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

action.title: Unarmed Strike
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

githzerai_zerth.spells: mage hand, feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

trait.title: Psychic Defense
value: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

glabrezu.name: Glabrezu

action.title: Multiattack
value: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.title: Pincer
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
value: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A glabrezu has a 30 percent chance of summoning 1d3 vrocks, 1d2 hezrous, or one glabrezu.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

glabrezu.spells: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, confusion, fly, power word stun
glabrezu.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic
1/day each: confusion, fly, power word stun

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.title: Shield Bash
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Brave
value: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.title: Brute
value: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

reaction.title: Parry
value: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.title: Longbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.title: Rampage
value: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

value: The gnoll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

value: One creature the gnoll can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the gnoll and has the Rampage trait.

trait.title: Rampage
value: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Charge
value: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Sure-Footed
value: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Nimble Escape
value: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.

action.title: Scimitar
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.title: Javelin
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6) piercing damage.

trait.title: Nimble Escape
value: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

reaction.title: Redirect Attack
value: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
value: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Fire Breath. The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Weakening Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.title: Gore
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

trait.title: Trampling Charge
value: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

goristro.name: Goristro

action.title: Multiattack
value: The goristro makes three attacks: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Hoof
value: Melee Weapon Attack:+ 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.title: Gore
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 45 (7d10 + 7) piercing damage.

trait.title: Charge
value: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

trait.title: Labyrinthine Recall
value: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Siege Monster
value: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

gray_ooze.name: Gray Ooze

action.title: Pseudopod
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

trait.title: Amorphous
value: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.title: Corrode Metal
value: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

gray_ooze.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

action.title: Psychic Crush (Recharge 5-6)

If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.

gray_slaad.name: Gray Slaad

action.title: Multiattack
value: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

action.title: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, invisibility (self only), mage hand, major image
2/day each: fear, fly, fireball, tongues
1/day: plane shift (self only)

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.title: Variant: Control Gem
value: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 (4d10) psychic damage to the slaad.

graz'zt.name: Graz'zt
graz'zt.immune: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

action.title: Multiattack
value: Graz'zt attacks twice with the Wave of Sorrow.

action.title: Wave of Sorrow (Greatsword)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target, Hit; 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage.

action.title: Teleport
value: Graz'zt magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

graz'zt.spells: charm person, crown of madness, detect magic, dispel magic, dissonant whispers, counterspell, darkness, dominate person, sanctuary, telekinesis, teleport, dominate monster, greater invisibility
graz'zt.type: fiend (demon, shapechanger), out of the abyss

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: Graz'zt can use his action to polymorph into a form that resembles a Medium humanoid, or back into his true form. Aside from his size, his statistics are the same in each form, Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Graz'zt's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Graz'zt can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: charm person, crown of madness, detect magic, dispel magic, dissonant whispers
3/day each: counterspell, darkness, dominate person, sanctuary, telekinesis, teleport
1/day each: dominate monster, greater invisibility

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Graz'zt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Graz'zt has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magic effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapon
value: Graz'zt's weapon attacks are magical.

Graz'zt can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creautre's turn. Graz'zt regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.title: Attack
value: Graz'zt attacks once with the Wave of Sorrow.

legendary.title: Dance, My Puppet!
value: One creature charmed by Graz'zt that Graz'zt can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as Graz'zt directs.

legendary.title: Sow Discord
value: Graz'zt casts crown of madness or dissonant whispers.

legendary.title: Teleport
value: Graz'zt uses his Teleport action.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.title: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The dragon can breathe air and water.

green_hag.name: Green Hag

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Illusory Appearance
value: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.title: Invisible Passage
value: The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

green_hag.spells: dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery, identify, ray of sickness, hold person, locate object, bestow curse, counterspell, lightning bolt, phantasmal killer, polymorph, contact other plane, scrying, eyebite

trait.title: Amphibious
value: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

trait.title: Mimicry
value: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

trait.title: Hag Coven
value: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

trait.title: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
value: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
• 1st level (4 slots): identify, ray of sickness
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, locate object
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, counterspell, lightning bolt
• 4th level (3 slots): phantasmal killer, polymorph
• 5th level (2 slots): contact other plane, scrying
• 6th level (1 slot): eye bite

For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12+the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4+the hag's Intelligence modifier.

trait.title: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
value: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes 3d10 psychic damage and is blinded for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while blinded. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

green_slaad.name: Green Slaad

action.title: Multiattack
value: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or staff. Alternatively, it uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.title: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw (Slaad Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Staff
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Hurl Flame
value: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. The fire ignites flammable objects that aren 't being worn or carried.

green_slaad.spells: detect magic, detect thoughts, mage hand, fear, invisibility, fireball

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, mage hand
2/day each: fear, invisibility (self only)
1/day: fireball

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.title: Variant: Control Gem
value: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 (4d10) psychic damage to the slaad.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The grell makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its beak.

action.title: Tentacles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is paralyzed, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also grappled (escape DC 15). If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also restrained until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can 't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any Medium or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

grick.name: Grick

action.title: Multiattack
value: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.title: Tentacles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

grick.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Stone Camouflage
value: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

grick_alpha.name: Grick Alpha

action.title: Multiattack
value: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Tentacles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

grick_alpha.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Stone Camouflage
value: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
