value: The mephit belches viscid mud onto one creature within 5 ft. of it. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
value: The mephit has a 25 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.title: Death Burst
value: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Beast of Burden
value: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.title: Sure-Footed
value: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

action.title: Multiattack
value: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.title: Rotting Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

action.title: Dreadful Glare
value: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

mummy.languages: the languages it knew in life

mummy_lord.name: Mummy Lord
mummy_lord.immune: necrotic, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

action.title: Multiattack
value: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

action.title: Rotting Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

action.title: Dreadful Glare
value: The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.

mummy_lord.spells: sacred flame, thaumaturgy, command, guiding bolt, shield of faith, hold person, silence, spiritual weapon, animate dead, dispel magic, divination, guardian of faith, contagion, insect plague, harm

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The mummy lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Rejuvenation
value: A destroyed mummy lord gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the mummy lord's heart.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The mummy lord is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The mummy lord has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, guiding bolt, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, dispel magic
• 4th level (3 slots): divination, guardian of faith
• 5th level (2 slots): contagion, insect plague
• 6th level (1 slot): harm

legendary.title: Attack
value: The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary.title: Blinding Dust
value: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.

legendary.title: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

legendary.title: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.

legendary.title: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.

mummy_lord.languages: the languages it knew in life

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

action.title: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
value: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Rapport Spores
value: A 20-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

trait.title: Distress Spores
value: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.title: Sun Sickness
value: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The myconid uses either its Hallucination Spores or its Pacifying Spores, then makes a fist attack.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (3d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.

action.title: Animating Spores
value: The myconid targets one corpse of a humanoid or a Large or smaller beast within 5 feet of it and releases spores at the corpse. In 24 hours, the corpse rises as a spore servant. The corpse stays animated for 1d4 + 1 weeks or until destroyed, and it can't be animated again in this way.

action.title: Hallucination Spores
value: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target is incapacitated while it hallucinates. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Pacifying Spores
value: The myconid ejects spores at one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Rapport Spores
value: A 30-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

trait.title: Distress Spores
value: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.title: Sun Sickness
value: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4- 1) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

action.title: Rapport Spores (3/Day)
value: A 10-foot radius of spores extends from the myconid. These spores can go around corners and affect only creatures with an Intelligence of 2 or higher that aren't undead, constructs, or elementals. Affected creatures can communicate telepathically with one another while they are within 30 feet of each other. The effect lasts for 1 hour.

trait.title: Distress Spores
value: When the myconid takes damage, all other myconids within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

trait.title: Sun Sickness
value: While in sunlight, the myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in direct sunlight.

naergoth_bladelord.name: Naergoth Bladelord

action.title: Multiattack
value: Naergoth makes three attacks, either with his longsword or longbow. He can use Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.title: Life Drain
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) if used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

action.title: Longbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

naergoth_bladelord.resist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

nalfeshnee.name: Nalfeshnee

action.title: Multiattack
value: The nalfeshnee uses Horror Nimbus if it can.  It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

action.title: Horror Nimbus (Recharge 5-6)
value: The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

action.title: Teleport
value: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.title: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
value: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nalfeshnee has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d4 vrocks, 1d3 hezrous, 1d2 glabrezus, or one nalfeshnee.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

nalfeshnee.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

narrak.name: Narrak

action.title: Armor of Shadows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: Narrak casts mage armor on himself

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

narrak.spells: eldritch blast, friends, poison spray, armor of agathys, charm person, hex, hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

trait.title: Insanity
value: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Narrak is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing ashort or long rest, and knows the following Warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray
1st level: armor of Agathys, charm person, hex
2nd level: hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

reaction.title: One with Shadows
value: While he is in adim light or darkness, Narrak can become invisible. He remains so until he moves or takes an action or reaction.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.title: Needles
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.title: Fey Ancestry
value: Magic can't put Neronvain to sleep.

action.title: Multiattack
value: Neronvain makes two attacks, either with his shortsword or Eldritch Arrow.

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

action.title: Eldritch Arrow
value: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

action.title: Poisonous Cloud (2/Day)
value: Poison gas fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Neronvain can see within 50 feet of him. The gas spreads around corners and remains until the start of Neronvain's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the gas must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.title: Draconic Majesty
value: Neronvain adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

nezznar_the_black_spider.name: Nezznar the Black Spider

action.title: Spider Staff
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

nezznar_the_black_spider.spells: dancing lights, darkness, faerie fire, mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp, mage armor, magic missile, shield, invisibility, suggestion

trait.title: Special Equipment
value: Nezznar has a spider staff.

trait.title: Fey Ancestry
value: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls when he or his target is in sunlight.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Nezznar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• At will: dancing lights
• 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire (save DC 12)

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Nezznar is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). Nezznar has the following spells prepared from the wizard's spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp
• 1st Level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield
• 2nd Level (3 slots): invisibility, suggestion

night_hag.name: Night Hag

action.title: Claws (Hag Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Change Shape
value: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

action.title: Etherealness
value: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

action.title: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
value: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or similar magic.

night_hag.spells: detect magic, magic missile, plane shift, ray of enfeeblement, sleep, identify, ray of sickness, hold person, locate object, bestow curse, counterspell, lightning bolt, phantasmal killer, polymorph, contact other plane, scrying, eyebite
night_hag.resist: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, magic missile
2/day each: plane shift (self only), ray of enfeeblement, sleep

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Night Hag Items
value: A night hag carries two very rare magic items that she must craft for herself If either object is lost, the night hag will go to great lengths to retrieve it, as creating a new tool takes time and effort.
Heartstone: This lustrous black gem allows a night hag to become ethereal while it is in her possession. The touch of a heartstone also cures any disease. Crafting a heartstone takes 30 days.

Soul Bag: When an evil humanoid dies as a result of a night hag's Nightmare Haunting, the hag catches the soul in this black sack made of stitched flesh. A soul bag can hold only one evil soul at a time, and only the night hag who crafted the bag can catch a soul with it. Crafting a soul bag takes 7 days and a humanoid sacrifice (whose flesh is used to make the bag).

trait.title: Hag Coven
value: When hags must work together, they form covens, in spite of their selfish natures. A coven is made up of hags of any type, all of whom are equals within the group. However, each of the hags continues to desire more personal power.

A coven consists of three hags so that any arguments between two hags can be settled by the third. If more than three hags ever come together, as might happen if two covens come into conflict, the result is usually chaos.

trait.title: Shared Spellcasting (Coven Only)
value: While all three members of a hag coven are within 30 feet of one another, they can each cast the following spells from the wizard's spell list but must share the spell slots among themselves:
• 1st level (4 slots): identify, ray of sickness
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, locate object
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, counterspell, lightning bolt
• 4th level (3 slots): phantasmal killer, polymorph
• 5th level (2 slots): contact other plane, scrying
• 6th level (1 slot): eye bite

For casting these spells, each hag is a 12th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability. The spell save DC is 12+the hag's Intelligence modifier, and the spell attack bonus is 4+the hag's Intelligence modifier.

trait.title: Hag Eye (Coven Only)
value: A hag coven can craft a magic item called a hag eye, which is made from a real eye coated in varnish and often fitted to a pendant or other wearable item. The hag eye is usually entrusted to a minion for safekeeping and transport. A hag in the coven can take an action to see what the hag eye sees if the hag eye is on the same plane of existence. A hag eye has AC 10, 1 hit point, and darkvision with a radius of 60 feet. If it is destroyed, each coven member takes 3d10 psychic damage and is blinded for 24 hours.

A hag coven can have only one hag eye at a time, and creating a new one requires all three members of the coven to perform a ritual. The ritual takes 1 hour, and the hags can't perform it while blinded. During the ritual, if the hags take any action other than performing the ritual, they must start over.

nightmare.name: Nightmare

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

action.title: Ethereal Stride
value: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

trait.title: Confer Fire Resistance
value: The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.

trait.title: Illumination
value: The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

nightmare.languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

action.title: Rapier
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.title: Parry
value: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The nothic makes two claw attacks.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Rotting Gaze
value: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

action.title: Weird Insight
value: The nothic targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must contest its Charisma (Deception) check against the nothic's Wisdom (Insight) check. If the nothic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target. The target automatically wins if it is immune to being charmed.

trait.title: Keen Sight
value: The nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

nycaloth.name: Nycaloth

action.title: Multiattack
value: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) slashing damage at the start of each of its turns due to a fiendish wound. Each time the nycaloth hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (2d4). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.title: Greataxe
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

action.title: Teleport
value: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.title: Variant: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
value: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A nycaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mezzoloths or one nycaloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, does as it pleases, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

nycaloth.spells: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility, mirror image
nycaloth.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), mirror image

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

ochre_jelly.name: Ochre Jelly

action.title: Pseudopod
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

trait.title: Amorphous
value: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

ochre_jelly.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

reaction.title: Split
value: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new jelly has hit points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

action.title: Tentacles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.title: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

trait.title: Hold Breath
value: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.title: Underwater Camouflage
value: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.title: Greatclub
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Javelin
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

ogre_zombie.name: Ogre Zombie

action.title: Morningstar
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Undead Fortitude
value: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

ogre_zombie.languages: understands Common and Giant but can't speak

ogremoch.name: Ogremoch

action.title: Multiattack
value: Ogremoch makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Boulder
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. Hit: 46 (7d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.title: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
value: Ogremoch summons up to three earth elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogremoch, and disappear if Ogremoch is reduced to 0 hit points.

ogremoch.spells: meld into stone, move earth, wall of stone
ogremoch.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Empowered Attacks
value: Ogremoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Ogremoch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• At will: meld into stone, move earth, wall of stone

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Ogremoch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Ogremoch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Siege Monster
value: Ogremoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

legendary.title: Illuminating Crystals
value: Ogremoch's crystalline protrusions flare. Each creature within 30 feet of Ogremoch becomes outlined in orange light, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature can't benefit from being invisible.

legendary.title: Stomp (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Ogremoch stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 30-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that radius must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

legendary.title: Create Gargoyle (Costs 3 Actions)
value: Ogremoch's hit points are reduced by 50 as he breaks off a chunk of his body and places it on the ground in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of him. The chunk of rock instantly transforms into a gargoyle and acts on the same initiative count as Ogremoch. Ogremoch can't use this action if he has 50 hit points or fewer. The gargoyle obeys Ogremoch's commands and fights until destroyed.

ogremoch.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

olhydra.name: Olhydra

action.title: Multiattack
value: Olhydra makes two slam attacks or two water jet attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.

action.title: Water Jet
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone if it fails a DC 19 Strength saving throw.

action.title: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
value: Olhydra summons up to three water elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.

olhydra.spells: wall of ice, ice storm, storm of vengeance
olhydra.resist: lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Empowered Attacks
value: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical weapons.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Olhydra's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
• At will: wall of ice
• 3/day: ice storm
• 1/day: storm of vengeance

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Olhydra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Olhydra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Water Form
value: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

legendary.title: Crush
value: One creature that Olhydra is grappling is crushed for 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.title: Fling (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Olhydra releases one creature she is grappling by flinging the creature up to 60 feet away from her, in a direction of her choice. If the flung creature comes into contact with a solid surface, such as a wall or floor, the creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was flung.

legendary.title: Water to Acid (Costs 3 Actions)
value: Olhydra transforms her watery body into acid. This effect lasts until Olhydra's next turn. Any creature that comes into contact with Olhydra or hits her with a melee attack while standing within 5 feet of her takes 11 (2d10) acid damage. Any creature grappled by Olhydra takes 22 (4d10) acid damage at the start of its turn.

olhydra.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

one-eyed_shiver.name: One-Eyed Shiver

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Eye of Frost
value: The one-eyed shiver casts ray of frost from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also restrained. A target restrained in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

one-eyed_shiver.spells: chill touch, mage hand, fog cloud, mage armor, thunderwave, mirror image, misty step, fear

trait.title: Chilling Mist
value: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The one-eyed shiver is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:
• Cantrips (at will): chill touch, mage hand
• 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, mage armor, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): mirror image, misty step
• 3rd level (2 slots): fear

oni.name: Oni

action.title: Multiattack
value: The oni makes two attacks, either with its claws or its glaive.

action.title: Claw (Oni Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Glaive
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage in Small or Medium form.

action.title: Change Shape
value: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

oni.spells: darkness, invisibility, charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, sleep

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, invisibility
1/day each: charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, sleep

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.title: Greataxe
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Javelin
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.title: Aggressive
value: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

orc_eye_of_gruumsh.name: Orc Eye of Gruumsh

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d6 + 3 plus 1d8) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

orc_eye_of_gruumsh.spells: guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy, bless, command, augury, spiritual weapon

trait.title: Aggressive
value: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.title: Gruumsh's Fury
value: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The orc is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): bless, command
• 2nd level (2 slots): augury, spiritual weapon (spear)

action.title: Multiattack
value: The orc makes two attacks with its greataxe or its spear.

action.title: Greataxe
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (1d12 + 4 plus 1d8) slashing damage.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d6 + 4 plus 1d8) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.title: Battle Cry (1/Day)
value: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

trait.title: Aggressive
value: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.title: Gruumsh's Fury
value: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

orcus.name: Orcus
orcus.immune: necrotic, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

action.title: Multiattack
value: Orcus makes two Wand of Orcus attacks.

action.title: Wand of Orcus
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage.

orcus.spells: chill touch, detect magic, create undead, dispel magic, time stop

trait.title: Wand of Orcus
value: The wand has 7 charges, and any of its properties that require a saving throw have a save DC of 18. While holding it, Orcus can use an action to cast animate dead, blight, or speak with dead. Alternatively, he can expend or 1 or more of the wand's charges to cast one of the following spells from it: circle of death (1 charge), finger of death (1 charge), or power word kill (2 charges). The wand regains 1d4 + 3 charges daily at dawn.

While holding the wand, Orcus gains +3 AC and can use an action to conjure undead creatures whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500, These undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action. Once this property of the wand is used, the property can't be used again until the next dawn.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Orcus's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chill touch (17th level), detect magic
3/day each: create undead, dispel magic
1/day: time stop

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapon
value: Orcus's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Master of Undeath
value: When Orcus casts animate dead or create undead, he chooses the level at which the spell is cast, and the creatures created by the spells remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast create undead even when it isn't night.

Orcus can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Orcus regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.title: Tail
value: Orcus makes one tail attack.

legendary.title: A Taste of Undeath
value: Orcus casts chill touch (17th level).

legendary.title: Creeping Death (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area are vulnerable to necrotic damage.

oreioth.name: Oreioth

action.title: Dagger
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

oreioth.spells: chill touch, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, false life, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness, crown of madness, misty step, animate dead, vampiric touch

trait.title: Grim Harvest
value: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Oreioth is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): chill touch, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): false life, mage armor, magic missile, ray of sickness
• 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, misty step
• 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, vampiric touch

trait.title: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
value: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast animate dead on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

action.title: Greataxe
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1dl2 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Javelin
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.title: Aggressive
value: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.title: Tentacle
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.title: Tentacle Slam
value: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

trait.title: Limited Telepathy
value: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

trait.title: Flyby
value: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Sight
value: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Sight and Smell
value: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.title: Pounce
value: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

pegasus.name: Pegasus

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

pegasus.languages: understands Celestial, Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

action.title: Multiattack
value: The pentadrone makes five arm attacks.

action.title: Arm
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Paralysis Gas (Recharge 5-6)
value: The pentadrone exhales a 30-foot cone of gas. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.title: Axiomatic Mind
value: The pentadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.title: Disintegration
value: If the pentadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

peryton.name: Peryton

action.title: Multiattack
value: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

action.title: Gore
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

peryton.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Dive Attack
value: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.

trait.title: Flyby
value: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.title: Keen Sight and Smell
value: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

peryton.languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

phantom_warrior.name: Phantom Warrior

action.title: Multiattack
value: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword.

action.title: Spectral Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) force damage.

action.title: Etherealness
value: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

phantom_warrior.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.title: Ethereal Sight
value: The phantom warrior can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.title: Incorporeal Movement
value: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.title: Spectral Armor and Shield
value: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

phantom_warrior.languages: any languages it knew in life
phantom_warrior.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

pharblex_spattergoo.name: Pharblex Spattergoo

action.title: Multiattack
value: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

pharblex_spattergoo.spells: druidcraft, guidance, poison spray, cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave, barkskin, beast sense, spike growth, plant growth, water walk

trait.title: Amphibious
value: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

trait.title: Poison Strike (3/Day)
value: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth
• 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.title: Swamp Camouflage
value: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

trait.title: Ethereal Jaunt
value: As a bonus action, the spider can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Web Walker
value: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

pidlwick_ii.name: Pidlwick II

action.title: Club
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Dart
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Ambusher
value: During the first round of combat, Pidlwick II has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn yet.

pidlwick_ii.languages: understands Common but doesn't speak and can't read or write

action.title: Drop
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the piercer. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 (6d6). Miss: The piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

pit_fiend.name: Pit Fiend
pit_fiend.spells: detect magic, fireball, hold monster, wall of fire
pit_fiend.resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.title: Fear Aura
value: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, fireball
3/day each: hold monster, wall of fire

pixie.name: Pixie

action.title: Superior Invisibility
value: The pixie magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the pixie wears or carries is invisible with it.

pixie.spells: druidcraft, confusion, dancing lights, detect evil and good, detect thoughts, dispel magic, entangle, fly, phantasmal force, polymorph, sleep

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The pixie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The pixie's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only its pixie dust as a component:
At will: druidcraft
1/day each: confusion, dancing lights, detect evil and good, detect thoughts, dispel magic, entangle, fly, phantasmal force, polymorph, sleep

planetar.name: Planetar

action.title: Multiattack
value: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

action.title: Healing Touch (4/Day)
value: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

planetar.spells: detect evil and good, invisibility, blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead, commune, control weather, insect plague
planetar.resist: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Angelic Weapons
value: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.title: Divine Awareness
value: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The planetar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)
3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead
1/day each: commune, control weather, insect plague

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.title: Hold Breath
value: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist

action.title: Forceful Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft.
one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) force damage.

action.title: Telekinetic Thrust
value: The poltergeist targets a creature or unattended object within 30 feet of it. A creature must be Medium or smaller to be affected by this magic, and an object can weigh up to 150 pounds.

If the target is a creature, the poltergeist makes a Charisma check contested by the target's Strength check. If the poltergeist wins the contest, the poltergeist hurls the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including upward. If the target then comes into contact with a hard surface or heavy object, the target takes 1d6 damage per 10 feet moved.

If the target is an object that isn't being worn or carried, the poltergeist hurls it up to 30 feet in any direction. The poltergeist can use the object as a ranged weapon, attacking one creature along the object's path (+4 to hit) and dealing 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage on a hit.

poltergeist.resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Incorporeal Movement
value: The poltergeist can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the poltergeist has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.title: Invisibility
value: The poltergeist is invisible.

poltergeist.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak
poltergeist.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

priest.name: Priest

action.title: Mace
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

priest.spells: light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon, dispel magic, spirit guardians

trait.title: Divine Eminence
value: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary
• 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
• 3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

pseudodragon.name: Pseudodragon

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Sting
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

trait.title: Keen Senses
value: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Limited Telepathy
value: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 ft. of it that can understand a language.

trait.title: Variant: Familiar
value: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

pseudodragon.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage

trait.title: Flyby
value: The pteranodon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.title: Tail Stinger
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.title: Tunneler
value: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The quadrone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Shortbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Axiomatic Mind
value: The quadrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.title: Disintegration
value: If the quadrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.title: Wounded Fury
value: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The spore servant makes two claw attacks.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

quaggoth_thonot.name: Quaggoth Thonot

action.title: Multiattack
value: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

quaggoth_thonot.spells: feather fall, mage hand, cure wounds, enlarge/reduce, heat metal, mirror image

trait.title: Wounded Fury
value: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The quaggoth's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11 ). The quaggoth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: feather fall, mage hand (the hand is invisible)
1/day each: cure wounds, enlarge/reduce, heat metal, mirror image

quasit.name: Quasit

action.title: Claw (Bite in Beast Form)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Scare (1/day)
value: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Invisibility
value: The quasit magically turns invisible until it attacks or uses Scare, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the quasit wears or carries is invisible with it.

quasit.resist: cold; fire; lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 ft. fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form . Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed . It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Variant: Familiar
value: The quasit can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master. While the two are bonded, the master can sense what the quasit senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the quasit is within 10 feet of its master, the master shares the quasit's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the quasit can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.title: Blood Frenzy
value: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The quipper can breathe only underwater.

rahadin.name: Rahadin

action.title: Multiattack
value: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

action.title: Scimitar
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6+6) slashing damage.

action.title: Poisoned Dart
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d4+6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

rahadin.spells: misty step, phantom steed, magic weapon, nondetection

trait.title: Deathly Choir
value: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.title: Fey Ancestry
value: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: Rahadin's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
3/day: misty step, phantom steed
1/day: magic weapon, nondetection

trait.title: Mask of the Wild
value: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

rakshasa.name: Rakshasa
rakshasa.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

action.title: Multiattack
value: The rakshasa makes two claw attacks

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it is a creature. The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

rakshasa.spells: detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, minor illusion, charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image, suggestion, dominate person, fly, plane shift, true seeing

trait.title: Limited Magic Immunity
value: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The rakshasa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The rakshasa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, minor illusion
3/day each: charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image, suggestion
1/day each: dominate person, fly, plane shift, true seeing

rakshasa.vulnerable: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

rath_modar.name: Rath Modar

action.title: Quarterstaff
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

rath_modar.spells: fire bolt, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, chromatic orb, color spray, mage armor, magic missile, detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force, counterspell, fireball, major image, confusion, greater invisibility, mislead, seeming, globe of invulnerability

trait.title: Special Equipment
value: Rath has a staff of fire, and scrolls of dimension door, feather fall, and fireball.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Rath is an 11th-level spellcaster who uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Rath has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, minor illusion, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
• 1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, color spray, mage armor, magic missile
• 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, phantasmal force
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, major image
• 4th level (3 slots): confusion, greater invisibility
• 5th level (2 slots): mislead, seeming
• 6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability

reaction.title: Illusory Self (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
value: When a creature Rath can see makes an attack roll against him, he can interpose an illusory duplicate between the attacker and him. The attack automatically misses Rath, then the illusion dissipates.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.title: Mimicry
value: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The razerblast makes three melee attacks.

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

trait.title: Searing Armor
value: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

trait.title: Shrapnel Explosion
value: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.title: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC l3 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease — a minuscule slaad egg.

A humanoid host can carry only one slaad egg to term at a time. Over three months, the egg moves to the chest cavity, gestates, and forms a slaad tadpole. In the 24-hour period before giving birth, the host starts to feel unwell, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. At birth, the tadpole chews its way through vital organs and out of the host's chest in 1 round, killing the host in the process.
If the disease is cured before the tadpole's emergence, the unborn slaad is disintegrated.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.title: Variant: Control Gem
value: Implanted in the slaad's brain is a magic control gem. The slaad must obey whoever possesses the gem and is immune to being charmed while so controlled.

Certain spells can be used to acquire the gem. If the slaad fails its saving throw against imprisonment, the spell can transfer the gem to the spellcaster's open hand, instead of imprisoning the slaad. A wish spell, if cast in the slaad's presence, can be worded to acquire the gem.
A greater restoration spell cast on the slaad destroys the gem without harming the slaad.

Someone who is proficient in Wisdom (Medicine) can remove the gem from an incapacitated slaad. Each try requires 1 minute of uninterrupted work and a successful DC 20 Wisdom (Medicine) check. Each failed attempt deals 22 (4d10) psychic damage to the slaad.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The ruffian makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.title: Water Breathing
value: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 40 (6d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.title: Swallow
value: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet oft he remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.title: Heated Body
