value: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

swarm_of_wasps.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

talis_the_white.name: Talis the White

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

talis_the_white.spells: guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy, command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds, blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon, dispel magic, mass healing word, sending, death ward, freedom of movement, insect plague

trait.title: Special Equipment
value: Talis has +1 scale mail and a wand of winter.

trait.title: Fey Ancestry
value: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, resistance, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, inflict wounds
• 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon (spear)
• 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, sending
• 4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement
• 5th level (1 slot): insect plague

trait.title: Winter Strike (3/Day)
value: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) cold damage.

tarrasque.name: Tarrasque
tarrasque.immune: fire, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

action.title: Multiattack
value: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tai l. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

action.title: Horns
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.title: Frightful Presence
value: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.title: Swallow
value: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Reflective Carapace
value: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.title: Siege Monster
value: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

legendary.title: Attack
value: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary.title: Move
value: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.title: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

the_pudding_king.name: The Pudding King

action.title: War Pick
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

action.title: Change Shape
value: The Pudding King magically transforms into an ooze, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed by the new form. In ooze form, the Pudding King retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

action.title: Create Green Slime (Recharges after a Long Rest)
value: The Pudding King creates a patch of green slime (see "Dungeon Hazards" in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). The slime appears on a section of wall, ceiling, or floor within 30 feet of the Pudding King.

the_pudding_king.spells: acid splash, light, mage hand, poison spray, prestidigitation, false life, mage armor, ray of sickness, shield, crown of madness, misty step, gaseous form, stinking cloud, blight, confusion, cloudkill
the_pudding_king.type: humanoid (gnome, shapechanger), out of the abyss

trait.title: Stone Camouflage
value: The Pudding King has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.title: Gnome Cunning
value: The Pudding King has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The Pudding King's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: nondetection (self only)
1/day each: blindness/deafness, blur, disguise self

trait.title: Insanity
value: The Pudding King has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The Pudding King is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The Pudding King knows the following sorcerer spells:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mage hand, poison spray, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): false life, mage armor, ray of sickness, shield
2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, misty step
3rd level (3 slots): gaseous form, stinking cloud
4th level (3 slots): blight, confusion
5th level (1 slot): cloudkill

action.title: Multiattack
value: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

action.title: Variant: Weapons Multiattack
value: The thri-kreen makes two gythka attacks or two chatkcha attacks.

action.title: Variant: Gythka
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

action.title: Variant: Chatkcha
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.title: Chameleon Carapace
value: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

thri-kreen_(psionic).name: Thri-kreen (Psionic)

action.title: Multiattack
value: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

action.title: Variant: Weapons Multiattack
value: The thri-kreen makes two gythka attacks or two chatkcha attacks.

action.title: Variant: Gythka
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

action.title: Variant: Chatkcha
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

thri-kreen_(psionic).spells: mage hand, blur, magic weapon, invisibility

trait.title: Chameleon Carapace
value: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Standing Leap
value: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
value: The thri-kreen's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The thri-kreen can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
2/day each: blur, magic weapon
1/day: invisibility (self only)

action.title: Multiattack
value: The thug makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Mace
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Heavy Crossbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

thurl_merosska.name: Thurl Merosska

action.title: Multiattack
value: Thurl makes two melee attacks.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Lance
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

thurl_merosska.spells: friends, gust (ee), light, message, ray of frost, expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, levitate, misty step, haste

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Thurl is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Thurl knows the following sorcerer spells:
• Cantrips (at will): friends, gust, light, message, ray of frost
• 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump
• 2nd level (3 slots): levitate, misty step
• 3rd level (2 slots): haste

reaction.title: Parry
value: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

tiamat.name: Tiamat
tiamat.immune: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

action.title: Multiattack
value: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) slashing damage.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

action.title: Frightful Presence
value: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.title: Discorporation
value: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting (3/Day)
value: Tiamat can innately cast divine word (spell save DC 26). Her spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
value: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Limited Magic Immunity
value: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.title: Multiple Heads
value: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

legendary.title: Bite
value: Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options listed. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary.title: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.title: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.title: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Constitution saving throw, taking 77 (22d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.title: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.title: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
value: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 (16d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

tiamat.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.title: Pounce
value: If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The treant makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Rock
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Animate Trees (1/Day)
value: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.title: Siege Monster
value: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

tree_blight.name: Tree Blight

action.title: Multiattack
value: The blight makes four attacks: two with its branches and two with its grasping roots, If it has a target grappled, the blight can also make a bite attack against the target as a bonus action.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8+6) piercing damage.

action.title: Branch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Grasping Root
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature not grappled by the blight. Hit: the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 (1d6+6) bludegoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 15 and can be severed by dealing 6 slashing damage or more to it at once. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the blight but ends the grapple.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead tree.

trait.title: Siege Monster
value: The blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

tree_blight.languages: understands Common and Druidic but doesn't speak

action.title: Spear
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Gore
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage.

action.title: Stomp
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage

trait.title: Trampling Charge
value: If the triceratops moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Javelin
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.title: Axiomatic Mind
value: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.title: Disintegration
value: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.title: Chameleon Skin
value: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Stench
value: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with either its claws or its greatclub.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

action.title: Greatclub
value: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
value: The troglodyte spits acid in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.title: Chameleon Skin
value: The troglodyte has aadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.title: Stench
value: Any creature other than a ttroglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all ttroglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.title: Sunlight Sensitivity
value: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.title: Variant: Loathsome Limbs
value: Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:
1-10: Nothing else happens.
11-14: One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.
15- 18: One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.
19-20: The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.

The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.title: Tail
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

ultroloth.name: Ultroloth

action.title: Multiattack
value: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and makes three melee attacks.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.title: Hypnotic Gaze
value: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The charmed target is stunned. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

action.title: Teleport
value: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.title: Variant: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
value: The yugoloth chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
An ultroloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d6 mezzoloths, 1d4 nycaloths, or one ultroloth.

A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other yugoloths. The summoned yugoloth remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner takes a bonus action to dismiss it.

ultroloth.spells: alter self, clairvoyance, darkness, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, invisibility, suggestion, dimension door, fear, wall of fire, fire storm, mass suggestion
ultroloth.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The ultroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The ultroloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self, clairvoyance, darkness, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion
3/day each: dimension door, fear, wall of fire
1/day each: fire storm, mass suggestion

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The ultroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The ultroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

action.title: Claw
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

action.title: Mandibles
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

trait.title: Confusing Gaze
value: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.title: Tunneler
value: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

unicorn.name: Unicorn

action.title: Multiattack
value: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Horn
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Healing Touch (3/Day)
value: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.title: Teleport (1/Day)
value: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

unicorn.spells: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace, calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

trait.title: Charge
value: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.title: Innate Spellcasting
value: The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

legendary.title: Hooves
value: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary.title: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary.title: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
value: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.

vampire.name: Vampire

action.title: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
value: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.title: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

action.title: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

action.title: Charm
value: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bit attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.title: Children of the Night (1/Day)
value: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats or rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call 3d6 wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

vampire.resist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: If the vampire isn't in sun light or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Misty Escape
value: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Vampire Weaknesses
value: The vampire has the following flaws:
Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

legendary.title: Move
value: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.title: Unarmed Strike
value: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary.title: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
value: The vampire makes one bite attack.

vampire.languages: the languages it knew in life

vampire_spawn.name: Vampire Spawn

action.title: Multiattack
value: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.title: Claws
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The vampire is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The vampire has the following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
• 1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, fog cloud, sleep
• 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, gust of wind, mirror image
• 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, bestow curse, nondetection
• 4th level (3 slots): blight, greater invisibility
• 5th level (1 slot): dominate person

vampire_spellcaster.languages: the languages it knew in life

vampire_warrior.name: Vampire Warrior

action.title: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
value: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

action.title: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).

If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bit attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

action.title: Children of the Night (1/Day)
value: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats or rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call 3d6 wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

action.title: Greatsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

vampire_warrior.resist: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: If the vampire isn't in sun light or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
value: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Misty Escape
value: When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.title: Spider Climb
value: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.title: Vampire Weaknesses
value: The vampire has the following flaws:
Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

vampire_warrior.languages: the languages it knew in life

action.title: Vampiric Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

reaction.title: Barbed Tail
value: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

vampiric_ixitxachitl_cleric.name: Vampiric Ixitxachitl Cleric

action.title: Vampiric Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

vampiric_ixitxachitl_cleric.spells: guidance, thaumaturgy, charm person, create or destroy water, hold person, silence, dispel magic, tongues

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: The ixtachitl is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (Spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The ixitxachil has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): charm person, create or destroy water
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence
3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, tongues

reaction.title: Barbed Tail
value: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

vanifer.name: Vanifer

action.title: Multiattack
value: Vanifer makes two attacks.

action.title: Tinderstrike
value: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

vanifer.spells: chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy, burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield, darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray, counterspell, fireball, hypnotic pattern, wall of fire, dominate person

trait.title: Funeral Pyre
value: When Vanifer drops to 0 hit points, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

trait.title: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
value: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.title: Spellcasting
value: Vanifer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Vanifer knows the following sorcerer spells:
• Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, friends, mage hand, message, produce flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, hellish rebuke, shield
• 2nd level (3 slots): darkness, detect thoughts, misty step, scorching ray
• 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, hypnotic pattern
• 4th level (3 slots): wall of fire
• 5th level (2 slots): dominate person

action.title: Multiattack
value: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

action.title: Longsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.title: Shortsword
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Heavy Crossbow
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

action.title: Constrict
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is grappled (escape DC 12) . Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

action.title: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5-6)
value: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or become restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check, freeing it self or another entangled creature within reach on a success.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

action.title: Multiattack
value: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

action.title: Rotting Touch
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

trait.title: False Appearance
value: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

vladimir_horngaard.name: Vladimir Horngaard

action.title: Multiattack
value: Vladimir makes two fist attacks or two attacks with his +2 Greatsword.

action.title: Fist
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature against which Vladimir has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Vladimir can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

action.title: Greatsword +2
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6+4) slashing damage. Against Strahd, Vladimir deals an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage with this weapon.

action.title: Vengeful Glare
value: Vladimir targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him and against which he has sworn vengeance. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is paralyzed until Vladimir deals damage to it, or until the end of Vladimir's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of Vladimir for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see Vladimir, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

trait.title: Regeneration
value: Vladimir regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Vladimir's body is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.title: Rejuvenation
value: When Vladimir's body is destroyed, his soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.title: Turn Immunity
value: Vladimir is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.title: Vengeful Tracker
value: Vladimir knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and Vladimir are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by Vladimir dies, Vladimir knows.

vladimir_horngaard.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned

vrock.name: Vrock

action.title: Multiattack
value: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.title: Talons
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Spores (Recharge 6)
value: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

action.title: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
value: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn .

action.title: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
value: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.
A vrock has a 30 percent chance of summoning 2d4 dretches or one vrock.

A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

vrock.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Magic Resistance
value: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.title: Beak
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.title: Keen Sight and Smell
value: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.title: Pack Tactics
value: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.title: Trampling Charge
value: If the horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.title: Hooves
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

water_elemental.name: Water Elemental

action.title: Multiattack
value: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.title: Slam
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.title: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
value: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

water_elemental.resist: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Water Form
value: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.title: Freeze
value: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.

water_elemental.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

water_elemental_myrmidon.name: Water Elemental Myrmidon

action.title: Multiattack
value: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

action.title: Trident
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.title: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
value: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

water_elemental_myrmidon.resist: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Magic Weapons
value: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

water_elemental_myrmidon.languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

water_weird.name: Water Weird

action.title: Constrict

If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 ft. toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

water_weird.resist: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.title: Invisible in Water
value: The water weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

trait.title: Water Bound
value: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

water_weird.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it. is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Smell

werebear.ac: 10 (in humanoid form, 11 in bear and hybrid forms )

action.title: Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

trait.title: Shapechanger

Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
value: If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

wereboar.ac: 10 (in humanoid form, 11 in boar and hybrid forms )

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.title: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Shapechanger

Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Smell
value: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

wereraven.name: Wereraven
wereraven.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
wereraven.speed: 30 ft., fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms

value: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

action.title: Beak (Raven or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

action.title: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.title: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

trait.title: Mimicry
value: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

weretiger.name: Weretiger
weretiger.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

action.title: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: In humanoid form, the weretiger makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a humanoid or make two claw attacks.

action.title: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

action.title: Claw (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.title: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
value: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.title: Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
value: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the weretiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

werewolf.immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.title: Shapechanger
value: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.title: Keen Hearing and Smell
value: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

werewolf.ac: 11 (in humanoid form, 12 in wolf or hybrid form)

white_dragon_wyrmling.name: White Dragon Wyrmling
white_dragon_wyrmling.speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.

action.title: Bite
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

action.title: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
value: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

wiggan_nettlebee.name: Wiggan Nettlebee

action.title: Multiattack
value: Wiggan makes two attacks with his wooden cane.

action.title: Wooden Cane
value: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

trait.title: Spellcasting
